unnormalised: Okay, grab your chai and settle in, because the Bollywood gossip train is chugging along full steam!

unnormalised: First off, everyone's buzzing about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt possibly expecting again! Is baby Raha going to get a little sibling soon? Sources are saying Alia's been seen sporting some seriously baggy kurtas around Bandra lately. Maybe just a coincidence, maybe not!
